text: Ngakho-ke uMose waphindela ebantwini bakhe ethukuthele elusizi wathi, “Oh bantu bami! Ayizange yini iNkosi yenu inethembise isethembiso esihle na? Ngakube isikhathi enanithenjiswe sona sabukeka siside kunina noma nafisa ukuthi yehlele phezu kwenu intukuthelo evela eNkosini yenu nabe senephula isethembiso sami na?”
